ygData.subject: Re: MOnk BALANCE ISSUES
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I agree with this point. I d like to have an interupt move ... like slam or bash. I d see it as something like a Thunder Clap where the monk slaps his
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 2 Sep 1999 15:55:48 -0400 (EDT), you wrote:

>From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>

>And lastly give them slight chance to STUN our opponent - like
>paladin bash only slightly longer lasting maybe? It will not be a spell
>per say, just the shock of the damage dealt would cause disorientation in
>any opponent. This will be good against casters and allround usefull for
>saving damage 9stunned opponents do not attack.

I agree with this point. I'd like to have an interupt move ... like
slam or bash. I'd see it as something like a Thunder Clap where the
monk slaps his hands together loudly, distracting the caster.

I am only low lvl so I don't know if anyone with a flying kick would
use it in preference but it seems to be a reasonable mod.

Borix, 14th circle
Karana
